                        <div class="cv-preview" id="cvPreview">
                            <div class="text-center text-muted py-5">
                                <i class="fas fa-file-alt fa-3x mb-3"></i>
                                <h5>Aperçu du CV</h5>
                                <p>Votre CV apparaîtra ici</p>

                <div class="card mt-3 animate-on-scroll">
                    <div class="card-header">
                        <h5 class="mb-0"><i class="fas fa-history me-2"></i>Mises en page sauvegardées</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="card-body">
                        <div class="list-group" id="savedLayouts">
                            <a href="#" class="list-group-item list-group-item-action d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                                Mise en page professionnelle
                                <span class="badge bg-primary rounded-pill">Par défaut</span>
                            </a>
                            <a href="#" class="list-group-item list-group-item-action d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                                Mise en page créative

                            <a href="#" class="list-group-item list-group-item-action d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                                Version minimaliste
                            </a>
                        </div>

                                <i class="fas fa-cloud-download-alt me-1"></i> Importer une mise en page

                        <h5 class="mb-0"><i class="fas fa-question-circle me-2"></i>Aide</h5>

                                    <button class="accordion-button collapsed" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#collapseOne" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="collapseOne">
                                        Comment utiliser le constructeur?
                                    </button>
                                </h2>
                                <div id="collapseOne" class="accordion-collapse collapse" aria-labelledby="headingOne" data-bs-parent="#helpAccordion">

                        <div class="mt-4 pt-3 border-top">
                            <h6 class="fw-bold mb-3">Besoin d'aide supplémentaire?</h6>

    <!-- Component Editor Modal -->
    <div class="modal fade" id="componentEditorModal" tabindex="-1">
        <div class="modal-dialog modal-lg">

                    <h5 class="modal-title"><i class="fas fa-edit me-2"></i>Modifier le composant</h5>
                    <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"></button>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-body" id="componentEditorContent">
                    <!-- Dynamic content will be inserted here -->
                </div>

                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Annuler</button>

    <!-- Floating Autofill Button -->

        <i class="fas fa-magic fa-lg"></i>

{% block javascripts %}
    {{ parent() }}
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/Sortable/1.15.0/Sortable.min.js"></script>
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        // Animation on scroll
        function animateOnScroll() {
            const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.animate-on-scroll');
            elements.forEach(element => {
                const position = element.getBoundingClientRect();
                if (position.top < window.innerHeight - 50) {
                    element.classList.add('animated');
                }
            });
        }

        window.addEventListener('scroll', animateOnScroll);
        window.addEventListener('load', animateOnScroll);
        animateOnScroll(); // Initial check on page load

        // Highlight drop target
        const builderArea = document.getElementById('builderArea');

        builderArea.addEventListener('dragover', () => {
            builderArea.classList.add('highlight');
        });

        builderArea.addEventListener('dragleave', () => {
            builderArea.classList.remove('highlight');
        });

        builderArea.addEventListener('drop', () => {
            builderArea.classList.remove('highlight');
        });

        // Initialize component library sortable
        new Sortable(document.getElementById('componentLibrary'), {
            group: {
                name: 'shared',
                pull: 'clone',
                put: false
            },
            animation: 150,
            sort: false,
            handle: '.drag-handle',
            onClone: function(evt) {
                // Clone keeps the same dimensions as the original
                evt.item.classList.add('builder-component');
            }
        });

        // Initialize builder area sortable
        new Sortable(document.getElementById('builderArea'), {
            group: {
                name: 'shared',
                pull: false
            },
            animation: 150,
            handle: '.drag-handle',
            onAdd: function(evt) {
                // Clear placeholder message when items are added
                if (builderArea.querySelector('.text-center.text-muted')) {
                    builderArea.querySelector('.text-center.text-muted').remove();
                }

                // Add unique ID to each component in builder
                evt.item.id = 'component-' + Date.now();

                // Add edit and delete buttons
                const actionButtons = document.createElement('div');
                actionButtons.className = 'mt-3 mb-0 d-flex justify-content-end gap-2';
                actionButtons.innerHTML = `
                        <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary edit-component">
                            <i class="fas fa-edit me-1"></i> Modifier
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-danger remove-component">
                            <i class="fas fa-trash-alt me-1"></i> Supprimer
                        </button>
                    `;
                evt.item.appendChild(actionButtons);

                // Add component style
                evt.item.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease';
                evt.item.style.marginBottom = '16px';
                evt.item.style.borderRadius = '8px';
                evt.item.style.boxShadow = '0 3px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)';

                // Animation for newly added component
                evt.item.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
                evt.item.style.opacity = '0';

                setTimeout(() => {
                    evt.item.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                    evt.item.style.opacity = '1';
                }, 10);

                // Add click to select
                evt.item.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    if (!e.target.closest('button')) {
                        // Remove selection from all components
                        document.querySelectorAll('.builder-component').forEach(comp => {
                            comp.classList.remove('active');
                        });

                        // Add selection to this component
                        this.classList.add('active');
                    }
                });

                // Update preview and stats
                updatePreview();
                updateStats();
            },
            onChange: function() {
                updatePreview();
            },
            onSort: function() {
                updatePreview();
            }
        });

        // Handle color scheme selection
        document.querySelectorAll('.color-scheme').forEach(scheme => {
            scheme.addEventListener('click', function() {
                // Remove active class from all schemes
                document.querySelectorAll('.color-scheme').forEach(s => s.classList.remove('active'));

                // Add active class to clicked scheme
                this.classList.add('active');

                // Update preview with new color scheme
                updatePreview();

                // Apply color to buttons and other elements
                const primaryColor = window.getComputedStyle(this).backgroundColor;
                document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--primary-color', primaryColor);
            });
        });

        // Handle font selection
        document.getElementById('fontSelector').addEventListener('change', function() {
            const selectedFont = this.value;
            updatePreview();

            // Apply font to preview
            document.getElementById('cvPreview').style.fontFamily = selectedFont;
        });

        // Handle spacing adjustment
        document.getElementById('spacing').addEventListener('input', function() {
            updatePreview();
        });

        // Clear builder
        document.getElementById('clearBuilder').addEventListener('click', function() {
            if (confirm('Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir effacer tous les composants?')) {
                builderArea.innerHTML = `
                        <div class="text-center text-muted py-5">
                            <i class="fas fa-arrow-left fa-3x mb-3"></i>
                            <h5>Glissez les composants ici</h5>
                            <p>Construisez votre CV personnalisé en ajoutant des composants depuis le panneau de gauche</p>
                        </div>
                    `;
                updatePreview();
                updateStats();
            }
        });

        // Auto-fill all button
        document.getElementById('autofillAllButton').addEventListener('click', function() {
            autoFillAllComponents();
        });

        // Function to auto-fill all components
        function autoFillAllComponents() {
            // Clear the builder area first
            builderArea.innerHTML = '';

            // Add all components in a sensible order
            const componentTypes = ['header', 'profile', 'experience', 'education', 'skills', 'languages', 'projects', 'references'];

            componentTypes.forEach((type, index) => {
                // Find this component in the library
                const originalComp = document.querySelector(`#componentLibrary .builder-component[data-type="${type}"]`);
                if (originalComp) {
                    const clonedComp = originalComp.cloneNode(true);
                    clonedComp.id = 'component-' + Date.now() + Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 5);

                    // Add animation delay for staggered effect
                    clonedComp.style.transitionDelay = `${index * 0.1}s`;

                    // Style
                    clonedComp.style.marginBottom = '16px';
                    clonedComp.style.borderRadius = '8px';
                    clonedComp.style.boxShadow = '0 3px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)';

                    // Add action buttons
                    const actionButtons = document.createElement('div');
                    actionButtons.className = 'mt-3 mb-0 d-flex justify-content-end gap-2';
                    actionButtons.innerHTML = `
                            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary edit-component">
                                <i class="fas fa-edit me-1"></i> Modifier
                            </button>
                            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-danger remove-component">
                                <i class="fas fa-trash-alt me-1"></i> Supprimer
                            </button>
                        `;
                    clonedComp.appendChild(actionButtons);

                    // Add click to select
                    clonedComp.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                        if (!e.target.closest('button')) {
                            // Remove selection from all components
                            document.querySelectorAll('.builder-component').forEach(comp => {
                                comp.classList.remove('active');
                            });

                            // Add selection to this component
                            this.classList.add('active');
                        }
                    });

                    builderArea.appendChild(clonedComp);
                }
            });

            // Update preview and stats
            updatePreview();
            updateStats();

            // Show success notification
            showNotification('CV rempli automatiquement avec succès!', 'success');
        }

        // Enhanced notification function with types
        function showNotification(message, type = 'info') {
            // Remove any existing notifications
            const existingNotifications = document.querySelectorAll('.custom-notification');
            existingNotifications.forEach(notif => {
                document.body.removeChild(notif);
            });

            // Define colors based on type
            let bgColor, icon;
            switch(type) {
                case 'success':
                    bgColor = '#48bb78';
                    icon = 'check-circle';
                    break;
                case 'warning':
                    bgColor = '#ed8936';
                    icon = 'exclamation-triangle';
                    break;
                case 'error':
                    bgColor = '#e53e3e';
                    icon = 'times-circle';
                    break;
                default:
                    bgColor = '#3182ce';
                    icon = 'info-circle';
            }

            const notification = document.createElement('div');
            notification.className = 'custom-notification';
            notification.style.position = 'fixed';
            notification.style.bottom = '30px';
            notification.style.right = '30px';
            notification.style.backgroundColor = bgColor;
            notification.style.color = 'white';
            notification.style.padding = '15px 25px';
            notification.style.borderRadius = '10px';
            notification.style.boxShadow = '0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)';
            notification.style.zIndex = '9999';
            notification.style.display = 'flex';
            notification.style.alignItems = 'center';
            notification.style.minWidth = '300px';
            notification.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
            notification.style.opacity = '0';
            notification.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease';

            notification.innerHTML = `
                    <i class="fas fa-${icon} me-3" style="font-size: 1.5rem;"></i>
                    <div style="flex-grow: 1;">${message}</div>
                    <button type="button" style="background: none; border: none; color: white; font-size: 1rem; cursor: pointer; margin-left: 15px;">
                        <i class="fas fa-times"></i>
                    </button>
                `;

            document.body.appendChild(notification);

            // Animate in
            setTimeout(() => {
                notification.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                notification.style.opacity = '1';
            }, 10);

            // Add close button handler
            notification.querySelector('button').addEventListener('click', () => {
                notification.style.opacity = '0';
                notification.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
                setTimeout(() => document.body.removeChild(notification), 300);
            });

            // Auto remove after 4 seconds
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.body.contains(notification)) {
                    notification.style.opacity = '0';
                    notification.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        if (document.body.contains(notification)) {
                            document.body.removeChild(notification);
                        }
                    }, 300);
                }
            }, 4000);
        }

        // Save layout
        document.getElementById('saveLayout').addEventListener('click', function() {
            const layoutName = prompt('Entrez un nom pour cette mise en page:');
            if (layoutName) {
                // Get the current layout
                const layout = {
                    name: layoutName,
                    components: Array.from(builderArea.children)
                        .filter(el => el.dataset.type)
                        .map(el => {
                            return {
                                type: el.dataset.type,
                                id: el.id
                            };
                        }),
                    colorScheme: document.querySelector('.color-scheme.active').dataset.color,
                    font: document.getElementById('fontSelector').value,
                    spacing: document.getElementById('spacing').value,
                    timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
                };

                // Save to localStorage
                const savedLayouts = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cvLayouts') || '[]');
                savedLayouts.push(layout);
                localStorage.setItem('cvLayouts', JSON.stringify(savedLayouts));

                // Update saved layouts list
                updateSavedLayouts();

                // Show success message
                showNotification(`Mise en page "${layoutName}" sauvegardée avec succès!`, 'success');
            }
        });

        // Event delegation for component actions
        builderArea.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            // Handle edit button click
            if (e.target.closest('.edit-component')) {
                const component = e.target.closest('.builder-component');
                editComponent(component);
            }

            // Handle remove button click
            if (e.target.closest('.remove-component')) {
                const component = e.target.closest('.builder-component');
                if (confirm('Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce composant?')) {
                    // Fade out animation
                    component.style.opacity = '0';
                    component.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';

                    setTimeout(() => {
                        component.remove();
                        updatePreview();
                        updateStats();
                    }, 300);
                }
            }
        });

        // Load saved layouts
        updateSavedLayouts();

        // Update statistics
        function updateStats() {
            const components = Array.from(builderArea.children).filter(el => el.dataset && el.dataset.type);
            document.getElementById('components-count').textContent = components.length;

            // Calculate completion rate (based on having at least 5 components)
            const completionRate = Math.min(100, Math.round(components.length / 5 * 100));
            document.getElementById('completion-rate').textContent = completionRate + '%';

            // Calculate impact score (fictional score)
            const impactScore = Math.min(10, Math.round(components.length * 1.5));
            document.getElementById('impact-score').textContent = impactScore;

            // Add counter animation
            animateCounters();
        }

        // Animate counters
        function animateCounters() {
            document.querySelectorAll('.statistic-number').forEach(counter => {
                const target = counter.textContent;
                const isPercentage = target.includes('%');
                const numTarget = parseInt(target);
                let count = 0;

                const interval = setInterval(() => {
                    count += Math.ceil(numTarget / 20);
                    if (count >= numTarget) {
                        counter.textContent = target;
                        clearInterval(interval);
                    } else {
                        counter.textContent = isPercentage ? count + '%' : count;
                    }
                }, 50);
            });
        }

        // Preview update function
        function updatePreview() {
            const preview = document.getElementById('cvPreview');
            const components = builderArea.children;

            if (components.length === 0 || (components.length === 1 && components[0].classList.contains('text-center'))) {
                preview.innerHTML = `
                        <div class="text-center text-muted py-5">
                            <i class="fas fa-file-alt fa-3x mb-3"></i>
                            <h5>Aperçu du CV</h5>
                            <p>Votre CV apparaîtra ici</p>
                        </div>
                    `;
                return;
            }

            // Get selected style properties
            const colorScheme = document.querySelector('.color-scheme.active').dataset.color;
            const font = document.getElementById('fontSelector').value;
            const spacing = document.getElementById('spacing').value;
            // Get color value based on scheme
            let colorValue;
            switch(colorScheme) {
                case 'primary':
                    colorValue = '#6b46c1'; // Purple
                    break;
                case 'blue':
                    colorValue = '#3182ce'; // Blue
                    break;
                case 'teal':
                    colorValue = '#38b2ac'; // Teal
                    break;
                case 'green':
                    colorValue = '#48bb78'; // Green
                    break;
                case 'orange':
                    colorValue = '#ed8936'; // Orange
                    break;
                case 'red':
                    colorValue = '#e53e3e'; // Red
                    break;
                default:
                    colorValue = '#6b46c1'; // Default Purple
            }

            // Create HTML for preview
            let previewHtml = `
                    <style>
                        #cvPreview {
                            font-family: ${font};
                            line-height: ${spacing};
                            color: #2d3748;
                        }
                        .preview-section {
                            margin-bottom: 18px;
                        }
                        .preview-header {
                            color: ${colorValue};
                            border-bottom: 2px solid: ${colorValue};
                            padding-bottom: 5px;
                            margin-bottom: 10px;
                            font-weight: 600;
                        }
                        .preview-subsection {
                            margin-bottom: 12px;
                        }
                        .badge {
                            background-color: ${colorValue};
                            color: white;
                            font-weight: 500;
                            padding: 3px 8px;
                            border-radius: 4px;
                            display: inline-block;
                            margin-right: 5px;
                            margin-bottom: 5px;
                            font-size: 0.75rem;
                        }
                    </style>
                `;

            // Generate preview content based on components
            Array.from(components).forEach(component => {
                if (!component.dataset || !component.dataset.type) return;

                switch(component.dataset.type) {
                    case 'header':
                        previewHtml += `
                                <div class="preview-section">
                                    <h1 style="color: ${colorValue}; margin-bottom: 5px; font-weight: 700;">Ahmed Ben Salem</h1>
                                    <div class="d-flex justify-content-between">
                                        <div>Développeur Full Stack</div>
                                        <div>ahmed.bensalem@example.com • +216 55 123 456</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            `;
                        break;
                    case 'profile':
                        previewHtml += `
                                <div class="preview-section">
                                    <h4 class="preview-header">Profil</h4>
                                    <p>Développeur passionné avec 5 ans d'expérience en développement web et mobile. Spécialisé en React, Node.js et technologies cloud. Orienté solutions, avec une forte capacité à résoudre des problèmes complexes.</p>
                                </div>
                            `;
                        break;
                    case 'experience':
                        previewHtml += `
                                <div class="preview-section">
                                    <h4 class="preview-header">Expérience Professionnelle</h4>
                                    <div class="preview-subsection">
                                        <div class="d-flex justify-content-between">
                                            <strong>Développeur Senior</strong>
                                            <span>2020 - Présent</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="color: ${colorValue}; font-weight: 500;">Tech Solutions Tunisie</div>
                                        <ul style="margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 10px;">
                                            <li>Développement d'applications web pour des clients internationaux</li>
                                            <li>Optimisation des performances des applications existantes (+40% de vitesse)</li>
                                            <li>Leadership technique pour une équipe de 5 développeurs</li>
                                        </ul>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="preview-subsection">
                                        <div class="d-flex justify-content-between">
                                            <strong>Développeur Web</strong>
                                            <span>2018 - 2020</span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div style="color: ${colorValue}; font-weight: 500;">Digital Innovations SARL</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            `;
                        break;
                    case 'education':
                        previewHtml += `
                                <div class="preview-section">
                                    <h4 class="preview-header">Formation</h4>
                                    <div class="preview-subsection">
                                        <div class="d-flex justify-content-between">

        }

        // Edit component function
        function editComponent(component) {
            const modal = document.getElementById('componentEditorModal');
            const modalContent = document.getElementById('componentEditorContent');
            const type = component.dataset.type;
            const modalTitle = document.querySelector('#componentEditorModal .modal-title');

            // Set modal title based on component type
            let title = '';
            let icon = '';
            switch(type) {
                case 'header':
                    title = 'Modifier l\'en-tête';
                    icon = 'heading';
                    break;
                case 'profile':
                    title = 'Modifier le profil';
                    icon = 'user';
                    break;
                case 'experience':
                    title = 'Modifier l\'expérience professionnelle';
                    icon = 'briefcase';
                    break;
                case 'education':
                    title = 'Modifier la formation';
                    icon = 'graduation-cap';
                    break;
                case 'skills':
                    title = 'Modifier les compétences';
                    icon = 'star';
                    break;
                case 'languages':
                    title = 'Modifier les langues';
                    icon = 'language';
                    break;
                case 'projects':
                    title = 'Modifier les projets';
                    icon = 'code';
                    break;
                case 'references':
                    title = 'Modifier les références';
                    icon = 'comment';
                    break;
                default:
                    title = 'Modifier le composant';
                    icon = 'edit';
            }

            modalTitle.innerHTML = `<i class="fas fa-${icon} me-2"></i>${title}`;

            // Set different editor content based on component type
            let editorHtml = '';
            switch(type) {
                case 'header':
                    editorHtml = `
                            <div class="row mb-3">
                                <div class="col-md-6">
                                    <label class="form-label fw-bold">Nom complet</label>
                                    <input type="text" class="form-control" value="Ahmed Ben Salem">
                                </div>
                                <div class="col-md-6">
                                    <label class="form-label fw-bold">Titre professionnel</label>
                                    <input type="text" class="form-control" value="Développeur Full Stack">
                                </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row mb-3">
                                <div class="col-md-6">
                                    <label class="form-label fw-bold">Email</label>
                                    <input type="email" class="form-control" value="ahmed.bensalem@example.com">
                                </div>
                                <div class="col-md-6">
                                    <label class="form-label fw-bold">Téléphone</label>
                                    <input type="tel" class="form-control" value="+216 55 123 456">
                                </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row mb-3">
                                <div class="col-md-6">
                                    <label class="form-label fw-bold">Adresse</label>
                                    <input type="text" class="form-control" value="Tunis, Tunisie">
                                </div>
                                <div class="col-md-6">
                                    <label class="form-label fw-bold">Site web</label>
                                    <input type="url" class="form-control" value="https://ahmedbensalem.com">
                                </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="mb-3">
                                <label class="form-label fw-bold">Style de mise en page</label>
                                <select class="form-select">
                                    <option>Standard</option>
                                    <option>Centré</option>
                                    <option>Créatif</option>
                                    <option>Deux colonnes</option>
                                </select>
                            </div>

                            <div class="mb-3">
                                <label class="form-label fw-bold">Photo de profil</label>
                                <div class="d-flex align-items-center">
                                    <div class="form-check form-switch me-3">
                                        <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="showPhoto" checked>
                                        <label class="form-check-label" for="showPhoto">Inclure une photo</label>
                                    </div>
                                    <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary">
                                        <i class="fas fa-upload me-1"></i> Télécharger une photo
                                    </button>
                                </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="mb-3">
                                <label class="form-label fw-bold">Réseaux sociaux</label>
                                <div class="input-group mb-2">
                                    <span class="input-group-text"><i class="fab fa-linkedin"></i></span>
                                    <input type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="URL LinkedIn">
                                </div>
                                <div class="input-group mb-2">

                                    <input type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="URL GitHub">
                                </div>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary">
                                    <i class="fas fa-plus me-1"></i> Ajouter un réseau
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        `;
                    break;
                case 'skills':
                    editorHtml = `
                            <div class="mb-3">
                                <label class="form-label fw-bold">Style d'affichage</label>

                    break;
                case 'experience':
                    editorHtml = `

                    break;
                default:
                    editorHtml = `
                            <div class="mb-3">
                                <label class="form-label fw-bold">Titre de la section</label>

                                <select class="form-select">
                                    <option>Standard</option>

                                    <option>Détaillé</option>
                                </select>
                            </div>
                            <div class="mb-3">

                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="mb-3">
                                <label class="form-label fw-bold">Contenu</label>
                                <textarea class="form-control" rows="6" placeholder="Entrez le contenu de cette section...">Ceci est un exemple de contenu pour la section ${type}. Vous pouvez personnaliser ce texte selon vos besoins.</textarea>
                            </div>
                        `;
            }

            modalContent.innerHTML = editorHtml;

            // Store reference to edited component
            document.getElementById('saveComponentChanges').dataset.componentId = component.id;

            // Show modal
            const bsModal = new bootstrap.Modal(modal);
            bsModal.show();
        }

        // Save component changes
        document.getElementById('saveComponentChanges').addEventListener('click', function() {
            const componentId = this.dataset.componentId;
            const component = document.getElementById(componentId);

            // In a real app, you'd save the component configuration
            // For now, we'll just close the modal and update the preview
            bootstrap.Modal.getInstance(document.getElementById('componentEditorModal')).hide();

            // Show saving notification
            showNotification('Modifications enregistrées avec succès', 'success');

            setTimeout(() => {
                updatePreview();
            }, 300);
        });

        // Update saved layouts list
        function updateSavedLayouts() {
            const savedLayoutsContainer = document.getElementById('savedLayouts');
            const savedLayouts = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cvLayouts') || '[]');

            if (savedLayouts.length === 0) {
                savedLayoutsContainer.innerHTML = `
                        <div class="text-center text-muted py-3">
                            <i class="fas fa-folder-open mb-2 fa-2x"></i>
                            <p class="mb-0">Aucune mise en page sauvegardée</p>
                        </div>
                    `;
                return;
            }

            let layoutsHtml = '';
            // Sort layouts by timestamp (most recent first)
            savedLayouts.sort((a, b) => new Date(b.timestamp || 0) - new Date(a.timestamp || 0));

            savedLayouts.forEach((layout, index) => {
                const date = layout.timestamp ? new Date(layout.timestamp).toLocaleDateString() : '';

                layoutsHtml += `
                        <a href="#" class="list-group-item list-group-item-action d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center layout-item" data-index="${index}">
                            <div>
                                <div class="fw-medium">${layout.name}</div>
                                ${date ? `<small class="text-muted">${date}</small>` : ''}
                            </div>
                            <div class="d-flex">
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-link text-primary load-layout me-2" title="Charger cette mise en page" data-index="${index}">
                                    <i class="fas fa-file-import"></i>
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-link text-danger delete-layout" title="Supprimer" data-index="${index}">
                                    <i class="fas fa-trash-alt"></i>
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </a>
                    `;
            });

            savedLayoutsContainer.innerHTML = layoutsHtml;

            // Add event listeners to layout buttons
            document.querySelectorAll('.load-layout').forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    e.stopPropagation();
                    const index = this.dataset.index;
                    loadLayout(index);
                });
            });

            document.querySelectorAll('.delete-layout').forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    e.stopPropagation();
                    const index = this.dataset.index;
                    if (confirm('Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer cette mise en page?')) {
                        const savedLayouts = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cvLayouts') || '[]');
                        // Store the name for notification
                        const layoutName = savedLayouts[index].name;
                        savedLayouts.splice(index, 1);
                        localStorage.setItem('cvLayouts', JSON.stringify(savedLayouts));
                        updateSavedLayouts();
                        showNotification(`Mise en page "${layoutName}" supprimée`, 'info');
                    }
                });
            });

            // Layout item click handler
            document.querySelectorAll('.layout-item').forEach(item => {
                item.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    if (!e.target.closest('button')) {
                        const index = this.dataset.index;
                        loadLayout(index);
                    }
                });
            });
        }

        // Load layout function
        function loadLayout(index) {
            const savedLayouts = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cvLayouts') || '[]');
            const layout = savedLayouts[index];

            if (!layout) return;

            // Clear builder
            builderArea.innerHTML = '';

            // Add components from the library based on layout
            layout.components.forEach(comp => {
                // Find component in library
                const originalComp = document.querySelector(`#componentLibrary .builder-component[data-type="${comp.type}"]`);
                if (originalComp) {
                    const clonedComp = originalComp.cloneNode(true);
                    clonedComp.id = comp.id || 'component-' + Date.now();

                    // Style
                    clonedComp.style.marginBottom = '16px';
                    clonedComp.style.borderRadius = '8px';
                    clonedComp.style.boxShadow = '0 3px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)';

                    // Add action buttons
                    const actionButtons = document.createElement('div');
                    actionButtons.className = 'mt-3 mb-0 d-flex justify-content-end gap-2';
                    actionButtons.innerHTML = `
                            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary edit-component">
                                <i class="fas fa-edit me-1"></i> Modifier
                            </button>
                            <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-danger remove-component">
                                <i class="fas fa-trash-alt me-1"></i> Supprimer
                            </button>
                        `;
                    clonedComp.appendChild(actionButtons);

                    // Add click to select
                    clonedComp.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                        if (!e.target.closest('button')) {
                            // Remove selection from all components
                            document.querySelectorAll('.builder-component').forEach(comp => {
                                comp.classList.remove('active');
                            });

                            // Add selection to this component
                            this.classList.add('active');
                        }
                    });

                    builderArea.appendChild(clonedComp);
                }
            });

            // Set color scheme
            document.querySelectorAll('.color-scheme').forEach(scheme => {
                scheme.classList.remove('active');
                if (scheme.dataset.color === layout.colorScheme) {
                    scheme.classList.add('active');
                }
            });

            // Set font
            document.getElementById('fontSelector').value = layout.font || "'Poppins', sans-serif";

            // Set spacing
            document.getElementById('spacing').value = layout.spacing || 1.5;

            // Update preview and stats
            updatePreview();
            updateStats();

            // Show notification
            showNotification(`Mise en page "${layout.name}" chargée avec succès!`, 'success');
        }

        // Initialize any floating animations
        function initFloatingAnimations() {
            const floatingElements = document.querySelectorAll('.autofill-all-btn, .card');

            floatingElements.forEach(element => {
                // Create random subtle floating animation
                const randomX = Math.random() * 10 - 5; // -5 to 5
                const randomY = Math.random() * 10 - 5; // -5 to 5
                const randomDelay = Math.random() * 2; // 0 to 2
                const randomDuration = 3 + Math.random() * 2; // 3 to 5

                element.style.transition = `transform ${randomDuration}s ease-in-out ${randomDelay}s`;

                setInterval(() => {
                    element.style.transform = `translate(${randomX / 4}px, ${randomY / 4}px)`;
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        element.style.transform = 'translate(0, 0)';
                    }, randomDuration * 500);
                }, randomDuration * 1000);
            });
        }

        // Initialize the floating animations
        setTimeout(initFloatingAnimations, 1000);
    });
</script>
{% endblock %}
==================================================

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>{{ data.firstName }} {{ data.lastName }} - CV</title>
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: 'DejaVu Sans', Arial, sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: #333;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        .container {
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        .header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .photo {
            width: 100px;
            height: 100px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            overflow: hidden;
            margin: 0 auto 20px;
        }

        .photo img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        h1 {
            font-size: 24px;
            margin: 0 0 5px;
            color: #ee3124;
        }

        .contact-info {
            font-size: 14px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

        .section {
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }

        h2 {
            font-size: 18px;
            color: #ee3124;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
            padding-bottom: 5px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .entry {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .entry-title {
            font-weight: bold;
            margin-bottom: 3px;
        }

        .entry-subtitle {
            font-style: italic;
            margin-bottom: 3px;
        }

        .entry-period {
            font-size: 13px;
            color: #666;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .skills-list {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .skill-item {
            background-color: #f5f5f5;
            padding: 5px 10px;
            margin-right: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            border-radius: 3px;
            font-size: 13px;
        }

        .footer {
            text-align: center;
            margin-top: 40px;
            font-size: 12px;
            color: #999;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
<div class="container">
    <div class="header">
        {% if photoData is defined and photoData %}
            <div class="photo">
                <img src="{{ photoData }}" alt="Profile Photo">
            </div>
        {% endif %}

        <h1>{{ data.firstName }} {{ data.lastName }}</h1>

        <div class="contact-info">
            {% if data.email %}
                {{ data.email }}{% if data.phone %} | {% endif %}
            {% endif %}

            {% if data.phone %}
                {{ data.phone }}
            {% endif %}
        </div>

        {% if data.address or data.city or data.country %}
            <div class="contact-info">
                {{ [data.address, data.city, data.country]|filter(v => v is not empty)|join(', ') }}
            </div>
        {% endif %}
    </div>

    {% if data.education is defined and data.education|length > 0 %}
        <div class="section">
            <h2>Education</h2>

            {% for education in data.education %}
                <div class="entry">
                    <div class="entry-title">{{ education.degree }}</div>
                    <div class="entry-subtitle">{{ education.institution }}{% if education.location %}, {{ education.location }}{% endif %}</div>
                    <div class="entry-period">{{ education.startDate }}{% if education.startDate and education.endDate %} - {% endif %}{{ education.endDate }}</div>
                    {% if education.description %}
                        <div>{{ education.description }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                </div>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>
    {% endif %}

    {% if data.experience is defined and data.experience|length > 0 %}
        <div class="section">
            <h2>Professional Experience</h2>

            {% for experience in data.experience %}
                <div class="entry">
                    <div class="entry-title">{{ experience.position }}</div>
                    <div class="entry-subtitle">{{ experience.company }}{% if experience.location %}, {{ experience.location }}{% endif %}</div>
                    <div class="entry-period">{{ experience.startDate }}{% if experience.startDate and experience.endDate %} - {% endif %}{{ experience.endDate }}</div>
                    {% if experience.description %}
                        <div>{{ experience.description }}</div>
                    {% endif %}
                </div>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>
    {% endif %}

    {% if data.skills is defined and data.skills|length > 0 %}
        <div class="section">
            <h2>Skills</h2>

            <div class="skills-list">
                {% for skill in data.skills %}
                    <div class="skill-item">{{ skill }}</div>
                {% endfor %}
            </div>
        </div>
    {% endif %}

    {% if data.additionalInfo %}
        <div class="section">
            <h2>Additional Information</h2>

            <div>{{ data.additionalInfo }}</div>
        </div>
    {% endif %}

    <div class="footer">
        <p>CV generated on {{ generatedDate|date('F d, Y') }} using ESPRIT CV Generator</p>
    </div>
</div>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">

    <style>
        :root {
            --primary: #3498db;
            --secondary: #2c3e50;
            --accent: #1abc9c;
            --dark: #212529;
            --light: #f8f9fa;
            --gray: #6c757d;
            --border: #dee2e6;
            --white: #ffffff;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'DejaVu Sans', sans-serif;
            color: var(--dark);
            background-color: var(--light);
            line-height: 1.7;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        .cv-container {
            max-width: 1140px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            overflow: hidden;
            background-color: var(--white);
            border-radius: 8px;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
        }

            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary) 0%, var(--secondary) 100%);

            color: var(--white);

            overflow: hidden;
        }

            content: '';
            position: absolute;

                        <div class="contact-item">

                        </div>
                    {% endif %}

                    {% if data.github %}
                        <div class="contact-item">
                            <span class="contact-icon">GH</span>
                            <span>{{ data.github }}</span>
                        </div>
                    {% endif %}
                </div>

                {% if photoData is defined and photoData %}
                    <img src="{{ photoData|raw }}" alt="Profile Image" class="profile-img">
                {% endif %}
            </div>
        </div>
    </header>

    <!-- Main Content -->

        <!-- Experience -->

                            {% if experience.description %}
                                <p>{{ experience.description }}</p>
                            {% endif %}
                        </div>
                    {% endfor %}
                </div>
            </section>
        {% endif %}

        <!-- Education -->
        {% if data.education is defined and data.education|length > 0 %}

                <h2 class="section-title">Education</h2>

                    {% for education in data.education %}

                            <div class="timeline-dot"></div>
                            <div class="timeline-title">{{ education.degree }}</div>
                            <div class="timeline-company">{{ education.institution }}{% if education.location %}, {{ education.location }}{% endif %}</div>
                            <div class="timeline-period">{{ education.startDate }}{% if education.startDate and education.endDate %} - {% endif %}{{ education.endDate }}</div>
                            {% if education.description %}
                                <p>{{ education.description }}</p>
                            {% endif %}
                        </div>
                    {% endfor %}
                </div>
            </section>
        {% endif %}

        <!-- Skills -->
        {% if data.skills is defined and data.skills|length > 0 %}

                {% endfor %}

<!-- DEBUG: CLASSIC TEMPLATE LOADED -->
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="fr">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>CV {{ data.firstName }} {{ data.lastName }}</title>
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: {{ data.textColor|default('#000000') }};

        {% if data.selectedBackgroundType is defined and data.selectedBackgroundType == 'svg' %}
            background-image: url('/images/backgrounds/{{ data.selectedBackground }}');
            background-size: cover;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
        {% elseif data.selectedBackground is defined and data.selectedBackground != 'none' %}
            background-image: url('/images/backgrounds/{{ data.selectedBackground }}');
            background-repeat: repeat;
        {% else %}
            background-color: {{ data.selectedBackgroundColor|default('#ffffff') }};
        {% endif %}

            padding: 2cm;
            margin: 0;
        }

        h1, h2, h3, h4 {
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-top: 0;
            color: {{ data.textColor|default('#000000') }};
        }

        h1 {
            font-size: 1.8em;
            margin-bottom: 0.2em;
        }

        h2 {
            font-size: 1.4em;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
            padding-bottom: 5px;
            margin-top: 20px;
        }

        hr {
            border: 0;
            border-top: 1px solid #ddd;
            margin: 15px 0;
        }

        .header-container {
            display: flex;
            align-items: flex-start;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .profile-image {
            width: 120px;
            height: 120px;
            border-radius: 5px;
            object-fit: cover;
            margin-right: 20px;
        }

        .header-text {
            flex-grow: 1;
        }

        .contact-info {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .contact-info p {
            margin: 5px 0;
        }

        .job-title {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            font-weight: 400;
            color: #555;
            margin-top: 5px;
        }

        .section {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .experience-item, .education-item {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .item-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .item-title {
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .item-date {
            color: #666;
        }

        .item-subtitle {
            font-style: italic;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .item-description {
            margin-top: 5px;
        }

        .skills-list, .languages-list {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 10px;
            margin-top: 10px;
        }

        .skill-item, .language-item {
            background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
            padding: 3px 10px;
            border-radius: 3px;
        }

        @media print {
            body {
                padding: 0;
            }

            .page-break {
                page-break-before: always;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
<div class="header-container">
    {% if photoData is defined and photoData is not empty %}
        <img class="profile-image" src="{{ photoData }}" alt="{{ data.firstName }} {{ data.lastName }}">
    {% endif %}

    <div class="header-text">
        <h1>{{ data.firstName }} {{ data.lastName }}</h1>
        <div class="job-title">{{ data.position }}</div>

        <div class="contact-info">
            {% if data.email is defined and data.email is not empty %}
                <p><strong>Email:</strong> {{ data.email }}</p>
            {% endif %}

            {% if data.phone is defined and data.phone is not empty %}
                <p><strong>Téléphone:</strong> {{ data.phone }}</p>
            {% endif %}

            {% if data.address is defined and data.address is not empty %}
                <p><strong>Adresse:</strong>
                    {{ data.address }}
                    {% if data.city is defined and data.city is not empty %}
                        , {{ data.city }}
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if data.country is defined and data.country is not empty %}
                        , {{ data.country }}
                    {% endif %}
                </p>
            {% endif %}

            {% if data.linkedin is defined and data.linkedin is not empty %}
                <p><strong>LinkedIn:</strong> {{ data.linkedin }}</p>
            {% endif %}

            {% if data.github is defined and data.github is not empty %}
                <p><strong>GitHub:</strong> {{ data.github }}</p>
            {% endif %}
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<hr>

{% if data.additionalInfo is defined and data.additionalInfo is not empty %}
    <div class="section">
        <h2>Profil</h2>
        <p>{{ data.additionalInfo }}</p>
    </div>
{% endif %}

{% if data.experience is defined and data.experience|length > 0 %}
    <div class="section">
        <h2>Expérience Professionnelle</h2>

        {% for exp in data.experience %}
            <div class="experience-item">
                <div class="item-header">
                    <div class="item-title">{{ exp.position }}</div>
                    <div class="item-date">{{ exp.startDate }} - {{ exp.endDate|default('Présent') }}</div>
                </div>
                <div class="item-subtitle">{{ exp.company }}{% if exp.location %}, {{ exp.location }}{% endif %}</div>

                {% if exp.description is defined and exp.description is not empty %}
                    <div class="item-description">{{ exp.description }}</div>
                {% endif %}
            </div>
        {% endfor %}
    </div>
{% endif %}

{% if data.education is defined and data.education|length > 0 %}
    <div class="section">
        <h2>Formation</h2>

        {% for edu in data.education %}
            <div class="education-item">
                <div class="item-header">
                    <div class="item-title">{{ edu.degree }}</div>
                    <div class="item-date">{{ edu.startDate }} - {{ edu.endDate|default('Présent') }}</div>
                </div>
                <div class="item-subtitle">{{ edu.institution }}{% if edu.location %}, {{ edu.location }}{% endif %}</div>

                {% if edu.description is defined and edu.description is not empty %}
                    <div class="item-description">{{ edu.description }}</div>
                {% endif %}
            </div>
        {% endfor %}
    </div>
{% endif %}

{% if data.projects is defined and data.projects|length > 0 %}
    <div class="section">
        <h2>Projets</h2>

        {% for project in data.projects %}
            <div class="education-item">
                <div class="item-title">{{ project.name }}</div>

                {% if project.description is defined and project.description is not empty %}
                    <div class="item-description">{{ project.description }}</div>
                {% endif %}

                {% if project.technologies is defined and project.technologies is not empty %}
                    <div class="item-subtitle"><strong>Technologies:</strong> {{ project.technologies }}</div>
                {% endif %}
            </div>
        {% endfor %}
    </div>
{% endif %}

{% if data.skills is defined and data.skills|length > 0 %}
    <div class="section">
        <h2>Compétences</h2>

        <div class="skills-list">
            {% for skill in data.skills %}
                <div class="skill-item">{{ skill }}</div>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>
    </div>
{% endif %}

{% if data.languages is defined and data.languages|length > 0 %}
    <div class="section">
        <h2>Langues</h2>

        <div class="languages-list">
            {% for i, language in data.languages %}
                <div class="language-item">
                    {{ language }}
                    {% if data.languageLevels is defined and data.languageLevels[i] is defined %}
                        ({{ data.languageLevels[i] }})
                    {% endif %}
                </div>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>
    </div>
{% endif %}

<div class="footer">
    <p class="text-muted small">CV généré le {{ generatedDate|date('d/m/Y') }}</p>
</div>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="fr">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>CV - {{ data.firstName }} {{ data.lastName }}</title>
    <style>
        @page {
            margin: 0;
            size: A4 portrait;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'Helvetica', 'Arial', sans-serif;
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: #333;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background: #fff;
            font-size: 11pt;
        }

        .container {
            position: relative;
        }

        /* Header Section */
        .header {
            background-color: #ff3a3a;
            color: white;
            padding: 30px 40px;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .profile-info {
            flex: 2;
        }

        .profile-img-container {
            flex: 1;
            text-align: right;
            margin-left: 20px;
        }

        .profile-img {
            width: 120px;
            height: 120px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 3px solid white;
            object-fit: cover;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
        }

        h1 {
            margin: 0;
            font-size: 24pt;
            font-weight: bold;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
        }

        h2 {
            margin: 5px 0 15px;
            font-size: 14pt;
            font-weight: normal;
            opacity: 0.9;
        }

        /* Main Content */
        .main-content {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        /* Left Column */
        .left-column {
            flex: 1;
            padding-right: 20px;
            min-width: 200px;
        }

        /* Right Column */
        .right-column {
            flex: 2;
            padding-left: 20px;
            border-left: 1px solid #eee;
        }

        /* Contact Information */
        .contact-info {
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }

        .contact-info p {
            margin: 5px 0;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .icon {
            margin-right: 10px;
            width: 16px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #ff3a3a;
        }

        /* Section Styling */
        .section {
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }

        .section-title {
            color: #ff3a3a;
            font-size: 14pt;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            border-bottom: 2px solid #ff3a3a;
            padding-bottom: 5px;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        /* Experience & Education */
        .timeline-item {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            position: relative;
        }

        .timeline-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .timeline-title {
            font-weight: bold;
            margin: 0;
        }

        .timeline-period {
            color: #777;
        }

        .timeline-subtitle {
            color: #555;
            margin: 0 0 5px;
        }

        .timeline-description {
            margin: 0;
            text-align: justify;
        }

        /* Skills */
        .skills-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .skill-tag {
            background-color: #f0f0f0;
            padding: 5px 10px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            font-size: 10pt;
        }

        /* Languages */
        .languages-list {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            list-style-type: none;
        }

        .language-item {
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        .language-name {
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .language-level {
            color: #777;
        }

        /* Projects */
        .project-item {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .project-title {
            font-weight: bold;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .project-description {
            margin-bottom: 5px;
            text-align: justify;
        }

        .project-tech {
            font-style: italic;
            color: #555;
        }

        /* References */
        .references-list {
            list-style-type: none;
            padding: 0;
            margin: 0;
        }

        .reference-item {
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }

        .reference-name {
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        /* Footer */
        .footer {
            text-align: center;
            margin-top: 30px;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            font-size: 9pt;
            color: #777;
            background-color: #f9f9f9;
        }

        .footer .divider {
            margin: 0 10px;
        }

        /* Logo */
        .logo-container {
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            width: 80px;
        }

        .logo {
            width: 100%;
        }

        /* Additional Info */
        .additional-info {
            margin-top: 15px;
            padding: 10px;
            background-color: #f9f9f9;
            border-left: 3px solid #ff3a3a;
            text-align: justify;
        }

        /* Page Break Control */
        @media print {
            .page-break {
                page-break-after: always;
            }
        }
    </style>

<body>
<div class="container">
    <!-- Header -->
    <div class="header">
        <div class="profile-info">
            <h1>{{ data.firstName }} {{ data.lastName }}</h1>
            <h2>{{ data.position }}</h2>
        </div>
        <div class="profile-img-container">
            {% if photoData %}
                <img src="{{ photoData }}" alt="Photo de profil" class="profile-img">
            {% else %}
                <img src="/images/avatar-placeholder.png" alt="Photo de profil" class="profile-img">
            {% endif %}
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Main Content -->
    <div class="main-content">
        <!-- Left Column -->
        <div class="left-column">
            <!-- Contact Information -->
            <div class="section contact-info">
                <h3 class="section-title">Contact</h3>
                {% if data.email %}
                    <p><span class="icon">✉</span> {{ data.email }}</p>
                {% endif %}

                {% if data.phone %}
                    <p><span class="icon">☏</span> {{ data.phone }}</p>
                {% endif %}

                {% if data.address or data.city or data.country %}
                    <p><span class="icon">⌂</span>
                        {% if data.address %}{{ data.address }}{% endif %}
                        {% if data.address and (data.city or data.country) %}, {% endif %}
                        {% if data.city %}{{ data.city }}{% endif %}
                        {% if data.city and data.country %}, {% endif %}
                        {% if data.country %}{{ data.country }}{% endif %}
                    </p>
                {% endif %}

                {% if data.linkedin %}
                    <p><span class="icon">in</span> {{ data.linkedin }}</p>
                {% endif %}

                {% if data.github %}
                    <p><span class="icon">★</span> {{ data.github }}</p>
                {% endif %}
            </div>

            <!-- Skills -->
            {% if data.skills|length > 0 %}
                <div class="section">
                    <h3 class="section-title">Compétences</h3>
                    <div class="skills-container">
                        {% for skill in data.skills %}
                            <div class="skill-tag">{{ skill }}</div>
                        {% endfor %}
                    </div>
                </div>
            {% endif %}

            <!-- Languages -->
            {% if data.languages|length > 0 %}
                <div class="section">
                    <h3 class="section-title">Langues</h3>
                    <ul class="languages-list">
                        {% for language in data.languages %}
                            <li class="language-item">
                                <span class="language-name">{{ language }}</span>
                                {% if data.languageLevels[loop.index0] is defined %}
                                    <span class="language-level">{{ data.languageLevels[loop.index0] }}</span>
                                {% endif %}
                            </li>
                        {% endfor %}
                    </ul>
                </div>
            {% endif %}
        </div>

        <!-- Right Column -->
        <div class="right-column">
            <!-- Summary/About Me -->
            {% if data.additionalInfo %}
                <div class="section">
                    <h3 class="section-title">Profil</h3>
                    <div class="additional-info">
                        {{ data.additionalInfo }}
                    </div>
                </div>
            {% endif %}

            <!-- Work Experience -->
            {% if data.experience|length > 0 %}
                <div class="section">
                    <h3 class="section-title">Expérience Professionnelle</h3>
                    {% for exp in data.experience %}
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-header">
                                <h4 class="timeline-title">{{ exp.position }}</h4>
                                <span class="timeline-period">
                                        {{ exp.startDate }} - {{ exp.endDate|default('Présent') }}
                                    </span>
                            </div>
                            <p class="timeline-subtitle">
                                {{ exp.company }}{% if exp.location %}, {{ exp.location }}{% endif %}
                            </p>
                            {% if exp.description %}
                                <p class="timeline-description">{{ exp.description }}</p>
                            {% endif %}
                        </div>
                    {% endfor %}
                </div>
            {% endif %}

            <!-- Education -->
            {% if data.education|length > 0 %}
                <div class="section">
                    <h3 class="section-title">Formation</h3>
                    {% for edu in data.education %}
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-header">
                                <h4 class="timeline-title">{{ edu.degree }}</h4>
                                <span class="timeline-period">
                                        {{ edu.startDate }} - {{ edu.endDate|default('Présent') }}
                                    </span>
                            </div>
                            <p class="timeline-subtitle">
                                {{ edu.institution }}{% if edu.location %}, {{ edu.location }}{% endif %}
                            </p>
                            {% if edu.description %}
                                <p class="timeline-description">{{ edu.description }}</p>
                            {% endif %}
                        </div>
                    {% endfor %}
                </div>
            {% endif %}

            <!-- Projects -->
            {% if data.projects|length > 0 %}
                <div class="section">
                    <h3 class="section-title">Projets</h3>
                    {% for project in data.projects %}
                        <div class="project-item">
                            <div class="project-title">
                                {{ project.name }}
                                {% if project.link %}
                                    <a href="{{ project.link }}">(Lien)</a>
                                {% endif %}
                            </div>
                            {% if project.description %}
                                <p class="project-description">{{ project.description }}</p>
                            {% endif %}
                            {% if project.technologies %}
                                <p class="project-tech">Technologies: {{ project.technologies }}</p>
                            {% endif %}
                        </div>
                    {% endfor %}
                </div>
            {% endif %}

            <!-- References -->
            {% if data.references|length > 0 %}
                <div class="section">
                    <h3 class="section-title">Références</h3>
                    <ul class="references-list">
                        {% for reference in data.references %}
                            <li class="reference-item">
                                <div class="reference-name">{{ reference.name }}</div>
                                <div>
                                    {% if reference.position %}{{ reference.position }}{% endif %}
                                    {% if reference.position and reference.company %} - {% endif %}
                                    {% if reference.company %}{{ reference.company }}{% endif %}
                                </div>
                                {% if reference.contact %}
                                    <div>Contact: {{ reference.contact }}</div>
                                {% endif %}
                            </li>
                        {% endfor %}
                    </ul>
                </div>
            {% endif %}
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <div class="footer">
        <div>CV généré le {{ generatedDate|date('d/m/Y') }}</div>
    </div>

    <!-- Logo -->
    <div class="logo-container">
        <img src="/images/logo.png" alt="ESPRIT Logo" class="logo">
    </div>
</div>
</body>
