                    <label for="password">Mot de passe</label>
                    <span class="password-toggle" id="passwordToggle">
                        <i class="bi bi-eye"></i>
                    </span>
                </div>

                <div class="password-strength w-100" id="passwordStrength"></div>
                <small class="password-strength-text text-muted" id="passwordStrengthText">Votre mot de passe doit contenir au moins 8 caractères</small>

                <div class="form-floating position-relative mt-3">
                    <input type="password" class="form-control" id="confirmPassword" name="confirmPassword" placeholder="Confirmer le mot de passe" required>
                    <label for="confirmPassword">Confirmer le mot de passe</label>
                    <span class="password-toggle" id="confirmPasswordToggle">
                        <i class="bi bi-eye"></i>
                    </span>
                </div>

                <div class="form-check mb-4 mt-3">
                    <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="termsAgree" name="termsAgree" required>
                    <label class="form-check-label" for="termsAgree">
                        J'accepte les <a href="#" class="text-decoration-none">conditions d'utilisation</a> et la <a href="#" class="text-decoration-none">politique de confidentialité</a>
                    </label>
                </div>

                <input type="hidden" name="_csrf_token" value="{{ csrf_token('register') }}">
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary w-100 py-2">S'inscrire</button>
            </form>

            <div class="text-center mt-4">
                <p>Vous avez déjà un compte? <a href="{{ path('app_login') }}" class="text-decoration-none">Se connecter</a></p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="text-center mt-4 text-muted">
            <p>
                <small>© {{ 'now'|date('Y') }} ESPRIT CV Generator | {{ "2025-05-08 00:12:00" }}</small>
                <br>
                <small>{{ "Mohamed-abidi-95" }}</small>
            </p>
        </div>
    </div>
{% endblock %}

{% block javascripts %}
    {{ parent() }}
    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // Password visibility toggle
            function setupPasswordToggle(inputId, toggleId) {
                const passwordField = document.getElementById(inputId);
                const passwordToggle = document.getElementById(toggleId);

                passwordToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const type = passwordField.getAttribute('type') === 'password' ? 'text' : 'password';
                    passwordField.setAttribute('type', type);

                    // Toggle eye icon
                    const eyeIcon = passwordToggle.querySelector('i');
                    eyeIcon.classList.toggle('bi-eye');
                    eyeIcon.classList.toggle('bi-eye-slash');
                });
            }

            setupPasswordToggle('password', 'passwordToggle');
            setupPasswordToggle('confirmPassword', 'confirmPasswordToggle');

            // Password strength meter
            const passwordInput = document.getElementById('password');
            const strengthBar = document.getElementById('passwordStrength');
            const strengthText = document.getElementById('passwordStrengthText');

            passwordInput.addEventListener('input', function() {
                const password = this.value;
                let strength = 0;

                // Length check
                if (password.length >= 8) strength += 1;

                // Contains uppercase
                if (/[A-Z]/.test(password)) strength += 1;

                // Contains lowercase
                if (/[a-z]/.test(password)) strength += 1;

                // Contains digits
                if (/[0-9]/.test(password)) strength += 1;

                // Contains special characters
                if (/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/.test(password)) strength += 1;

                // Update the strength meter
                strengthBar.className = 'password-strength';

                if (password.length === 0) {
                    strengthBar.style.width = '0%';
                    strengthText.textContent = 'Votre mot de passe doit contenir au moins 8 caractères';
                } else {
                    switch(strength) {
                        case 1:
                        case 2:
                            strengthBar.classList.add('weak');
                            strengthBar.style.width = '33%';
                            strengthText.textContent = 'Faible';
                            break;
                        case 3:
                        case 4:
                            strengthBar.classList.add('medium');
                            strengthBar.style.width = '66%';
                            strengthText.textContent = 'Moyen';
                            break;
                        case 5:
                            strengthBar.classList.add('strong');
                            strengthBar.style.width = '100%';
                            strengthText.textContent = 'Fort';
                            break;
                    }
                }
            });

            // Form validation
            const registrationForm = document.getElementById('registrationForm');
            const confirmPasswordInput = document.getElementById('confirmPassword');

            registrationForm.addEventListener('submit', function(event) {
                const password = passwordInput.value;
                const confirmPassword = confirmPasswordInput.value;

                if (password !== confirmPassword) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    alert('Les mots de passe ne correspondent pas');
                    return false;
                }

                // You can add more validation here as needed
                return true;
            });
        });
    </script>
{% endblock %}
==================================================

Fichier: Templates\template_analytics\dashboard.html.twig

-----
{% extends 'base.html.twig' %}

{% block title %}Template Analytics Dashboard{% endblock %}

{% block stylesheets %}
    {{ parent() }}
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0-alpha1/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
    <style>
        :root {
            --primary-color: #3a6ea5;     /* Bleu calme */
            --primary-light: #6c8fb3;     /* Bleu plus clair */
            --secondary-color: #48a9a6;   /* Turquoise apaisant */
            --accent-color: #575f6e;      /* Gris bleuté */
            --background-color: #f8f9fb;  /* Blanc-bleu très léger */
            --card-bg: #ffffff;           /* Blanc pur */
            --text-primary: #2c3e50;      /* Bleu foncé (presque noir) */
            --text-secondary: #7a8898;    /* Gris bleuté moyen */
            --border-color: #e1e8ed;      /* Gris très clair */
            --success-color: #4cb8a6;     /* Vert turquoise */
            --warning-color: #e9b872;     /* Ocre/or doux */
            --shadow-color: rgba(147, 165, 186, 0.1); /* Ombre douce */
            --hover-bg: #f1f5f9;          /* Gris bleuté très clair pour hover */
        }

        body {
            background-color: var(--background-color);
            font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
            color: var(--text-primary);
            min-height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            position: relative;
        }

        .dashboard-container {
            padding: 2rem;
            flex: 1;
        }

        .page-title {
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }

        .page-title h1 {
            color: var(--primary-color);
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 1.8rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }

        .page-title p {
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            margin-bottom: 0;
        }

        .card {
            background-color: var(--card-bg);
            border: none;
            border-radius: 12px;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 20px var(--shadow-color);
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            overflow: hidden;

                                    {% set totalUses = 0 %}

                                    {% endfor %}

                                    {% set templateList = templateStats|slice(0, 6) %}
                                    {% if templateStats|length > 0 %}
                                        {% set espritOriginalFound = false %}
                                        {% for stat in templateList %}
                                            {% if stat.template_name == 'esprit original' %}
                                                {% set espritOriginalFound = true %}
                                            {% endif %}
                                        {% endfor %}

                                        {% if not espritOriginalFound %}
                                            {% set templateList = templateList|slice(0, 6) %}
                                        {% endif %}
                                    {% endif %}

                                            <td>{{ loop.index }}</td>

                                            </td>

                                                <i class="fas fa-arrow-up text-success"></i>
                                            </td>
                                        </tr>
                                    {% endfor %}

                                            <td>28</td>

                                            <td><i class="fas fa-arrow-up text-success"></i></td>
                                        </tr>
                                    {% endif %}

                                    {% if templateStats|length == 0 %}

                                            <td colspan="5" class="text-center">No data available</td>
                                        </tr>
                                    {% endif %}
                                    </tbody>
                                </table>

{% block javascripts %}
    {{ parent() }}
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/apexcharts"></script>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // More ambient colors for charts
            const colors = [
                '#3a6ea5', '#48a9a6', '#6c8fb3', '#719fb0',
                '#a0c1d1', '#8aacc8', '#4f86c6', '#60a5a9'
            ];

            // Chart 1: Template Comparison
            const templateComparisonOptions = {
                series: [
                    {% if templateStats|length > 1 %}
                    {{ templateStats[0].count }}, {{ templateStats[1].count }}
                    {% else %}
                    0, 0
                    {% endif %}
                ],
                chart: {
                    height: 300,
                    type: 'radialBar',
                    fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                },
                plotOptions: {
                    radialBar: {
                        dataLabels: {
                            name: {
                                fontSize: '16px',
                                offsetY: -10,
                                fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                                color: '#575f6e',
                            },
                            value: {
                                fontSize: '20px',
                                fontWeight: 600,
                                fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                                formatter: function (val) {
                                    return val + '%';
                                }
                            },
                            total: {
                                show: true,
                                label: 'Templates',
                                fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                                fontSize: '16px',
                                color: '#575f6e',
                                formatter: function () {
                                    return '{{ templateStats|length }}';
                                }
                            }
                        },
                        hollow: {
                            size: '50%',
                        },
                        track: {
                            background: '#f1f5f9',
                        }
                    }
                },
                labels: [
                    {% if templateStats|length > 1 %}
                    '{{ templateStats[0].template_name|capitalize }}',
                    '{{ templateStats[1].template_name|capitalize }}'
                    {% else %}
                    'No data', 'No data'
                    {% endif %}
                ],
                colors: colors,
                stroke: {
                    lineCap: 'round'
                }
            };

            // Chart 2: Country Distribution
            const countryDistributionOptions = {
                series: [
                    {% if countryStats|length > 0 %}
                    {% for stat in countryStats|slice(0, 5) %}
                    {{ stat.count }}{% if not loop.last %}, {% endif %}
                    {% endfor %}
                    {% else %}
                    0
                    {% endif %}
                ],
                chart: {
                    type: 'donut',
                    height: 300,
                    fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                },
                labels: [
                    {% if countryStats|length > 0 %}
                    {% for stat in countryStats|slice(0, 5) %}
                    '{{ stat.country }}'{% if not loop.last %}, {% endif %}
                    {% endfor %}
                    {% else %}
                    'No data'
                    {% endif %}
                ],
                colors: colors,
                legend: {
                    position: 'bottom',
                    fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                },
                plotOptions: {
                    pie: {
                        donut: {
                            size: '55%',
                            background: 'transparent',
                            labels: {
                                show: true,
                                name: {
                                    show: true,
                                    fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                                    color: '#575f6e',
                                },
                                value: {
                                    show: true,
                                    fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                                    color: '#2c3e50',
                                    formatter: function(val) {
                                        return val
                                    }
                                },
                                total: {
                                    show: true,
                                    label: 'Total',
                                    fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                                    color: '#575f6e',
                                    formatter: function (w) {
                                        return w.globals.seriesTotals.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0)
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                },
                responsive: [{
                    breakpoint: 480,
                    options: {
                        chart: {
                            height: 250
                        },
                        legend: {
                            position: 'bottom'
                        }
                    }
                }]
            };

            // Chart 3: Timeline
            const timelineOptions = {
                series: [{
                    name: 'Template Selections',
                    data: [31, 40, 28, 51, 42, 82, 56]
                }],
                chart: {
                    height: 300,
                    type: 'area',
                    fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                    toolbar: {
                        show: false
                    },
                },
                colors: [colors[0]],
                dataLabels: {
                    enabled: false
                },
                stroke: {
                    curve: 'smooth',
                    width: 2
                },
                xaxis: {
                    type: 'datetime',
                    categories: [
                        "2023-05-01",
                        "2023-05-02",
                        "2023-05-03",
                        "2023-05-04",
                        "2023-05-05",
                        "2023-05-06",
                        "2023-05-07"
                    ],
                    labels: {
                        style: {
                            colors: '#575f6e',
                            fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                        }
                    }
                },
                yaxis: {
                    labels: {
                        style: {
                            colors: '#575f6e',
                            fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                        }
                    }
                },
                tooltip: {
                    x: {
                        format: 'dd/MM/yy'
                    },
                    style: {
                        fontFamily: 'Segoe UI, sans-serif',
                    }
                },
                fill: {
                    type: 'gradient',
                    gradient: {
                        shadeIntensity: 1,
                        opacityFrom: 0.7,
                        opacityTo: 0.2,
                        stops: [0, 90, 100]
                    }
                }
            };

            // Render Charts if chart elements exist
            const templateComparisonChart = document.getElementById('template-comparison-chart');
            if (templateComparisonChart) {
                new ApexCharts(templateComparisonChart, templateComparisonOptions).render();
            }

            const countryDistributionChart = document.getElementById('country-distribution-chart');
            if (countryDistributionChart) {
                new ApexCharts(countryDistributionChart, countryDistributionOptions).render();
            }

            const timelineChart = document.getElementById('template-timeline-chart');
            if (timelineChart) {
                new ApexCharts(timelineChart, timelineOptions).render();
            }

            // Toggle user data section
            const toggleUserDataBtn = document.getElementById('show-user-data');
            const userDataSection = document.getElementById('user-data-section');

            if (toggleUserDataBtn && userDataSection) {
                toggleUserDataBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    if (userDataSection.style.display === 'none') {
                        userDataSection.style.display = 'block';
                        this.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-users"></i> Hide User Data';
                        loadUserData(1); // Load first page of users
                    } else {
                        userDataSection.style.display = 'none';
                        this.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-users"></i> Show User Data';
                    }
                });
            }

            // Tab switching functionality
            const tabButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-button');
            if (tabButtons.length > 0) {
                tabButtons.forEach(button => {
                    button.addEventListener('click', function() {
                        // Remove active class from all buttons
                        tabButtons.forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
                        // Add active class to clicked button
                        this.classList.add('active');
                        // Load data based on the selected tab
                        const tab = this.getAttribute('data-tab');
                        loadUserData(1, tab);
                    });
                });
            }

            // User search functionality
            const userSearchInput = document.getElementById('user-search-input');
            if (userSearchInput) {
                let searchTimeout;
                userSearchInput.addEventListener('input', function() {
                    clearTimeout(searchTimeout);
                    searchTimeout = setTimeout(() => {
                        const searchTerm = this.value.trim().toLowerCase();
                        const activeTab = document.querySelector('.tab-button.active').getAttribute('data-tab');
                        loadUserData(1, activeTab, searchTerm);
                    }, 500);
                });
            }

            // User data loading and pagination
            function loadUserData(page = 1, tab = 'all-users', search = '') {
                // In a real implementation, this would be an AJAX call to your server
                // For this example, we'll simulate data with JavaScript

                const usersPerPage = 10;
                const totalUsers = 700; // This would come from your backend

                // Create fake user data for demo
                const userData = generateUserData(totalUsers);

                // Filter data based on tab and search term
                let filteredUsers = userData;

                if (tab === 'recent-activity') {
                    // Filter to show only recently active users (last 7 days)
                    const sevenDaysAgo = new Date();
                    sevenDaysAgo.setDate(sevenDaysAgo.getDate() - 7);
                    filteredUsers = userData.filter(user => new Date(user.lastActive) >= sevenDaysAgo);
                } else if (tab === 'verified-users') {
                    // Filter to show only verified users
                    filteredUsers = userData.filter(user => user.status === 'Verified');
                }

                // Apply search filter if provided
                if (search) {
                    filteredUsers = filteredUsers.filter(user =>
                        user.name.toLowerCase().includes(search) ||
                        user.email.toLowerCase().includes(search) ||
                        user.country.toLowerCase().includes(search)
                    );
                }

                // Paginate the data
                const startIndex = (page - 1) * usersPerPage;
                const endIndex = Math.min(startIndex + usersPerPage, filteredUsers.length);
                const paginatedUsers = filteredUsers.slice(startIndex, endIndex);

                // Update pagination info
                document.getElementById('showing-start').textContent = filteredUsers.length > 0 ? startIndex + 1 : 0;
                document.getElementById('showing-end').textContent = endIndex;
                document.getElementById('total-count').textContent = filteredUsers.length;

                // Render the users
                renderUsers(paginatedUsers);

                // Update pagination buttons
                renderPagination(page, Math.ceil(filteredUsers.length / usersPerPage), tab, search);
            }
            function viewUser(userId) {
                alert(`Viewing details for user ID: ${userId}`);
                // This would normally open a modal with user details
            }

            function editUser(userId) {
                alert(`Editing user ID: ${userId}`);
                // This would normally open a form to edit user details
            }

            function deleteUser(userId) {
                if (confirm(`Are you sure you want to delete user ID: ${userId}?`)) {
                    alert(`User ID: ${userId} has been deleted.`);
                    // This would normally send a request to delete the user
                }
            }
            // Generate fake user data
            function generateUserData(count) {
                // Real sample users based on your provided data
                const realUsers = [
                    { id: 1, email: 'test-admin@example.com', firstName: 'Test', lastName: 'Admin', country: 'France', roles: 'ROLE_USER, ROLE_ADMIN', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['modern', 'elegant'] },
                    { id: 2, email: 'test-user@example.com', firstName: 'Test', lastName: 'User', country: 'Algeria', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['professional'] },
                    { id: 3, email: 'mohamed.abidi@esprim.tn', firstName: 'mohamed', lastName: 'abidi', country: 'Germany', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'No', templates: ['ESPRIT Original'] },
                    { id: 4, email: 'mohamed.abidi95100@gmail.com', firstName: 'mohamed', lastName: 'abidi', country: 'Spain', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'No', templates: ['creative'] },
                    { id: 5, email: 'ali.trabelsi96@example.com', firstName: 'Ali', lastName: 'Trabelsi', country: 'Tunisia', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['minimalist'] },
                    { id: 6, email: 'amine.bouzid627@example.com', firstName: 'Amine', lastName: 'Bouzid', country: 'Tunisia', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['technical'] },
                    { id: 7, email: 'mohammed.nasri819@example.com', firstName: 'Mohammed', lastName: 'Nasri', country: 'Tunisia', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['ESPRIT Original', 'technical'] },
                    { id: 8, email: 'amine.nasri361@example.com', firstName: 'Amine', lastName: 'Nasri', country: 'Tunisia', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['academic'] },
                    { id: 9, email: 'mohammed.benali57@example.com', firstName: 'Mohammed', lastName: 'Ben Ali', country: 'Tunisia', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['minimalist'] },
                    { id: 10, email: 'karim.benali688@example.com', firstName: 'Karim', lastName: 'Benali', country: 'Algeria', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['creative', 'modern'] },
                    { id: 17, email: 'jean.dubois477@example.com', firstName: 'Jean', lastName: 'Dubois', country: 'France', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['professional'] },
                    { id: 20, email: 'thomas.robert239@example.com', firstName: 'Thomas', lastName: 'Robert', country: 'France', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['modern', 'professional', 'minimalist'] },
                    { id: 28, email: 'michael.müller773@example.com', firstName: 'Michael', lastName: 'Müller', country: 'Germany', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['technical'] },
                    { id: 29, email: 'andreas.schmidt865@example.com', firstName: 'Andreas', lastName: 'Schmidt', country: 'Germany', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['elegant', 'creative'] },
                    { id: 36, email: 'francisco.rodríguez193@example.com', firstName: 'Francisco', lastName: 'Rodríguez', country: 'Spain', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes', templates: ['academic', 'ESPRIT Original'] }
                ];

                // Generate additional users to match the count
                const users = [...realUsers];

                // If we need more users beyond our real samples, generate them from the table data
                if (count > realUsers.length) {
                    // From your provided data, extract these users for more realistic data
                    const additionalUsers = [
                        { id: 11, email: 'farid.belkacemi587@example.com', firstName: 'Farid', lastName: 'Belkacemi', country: 'Algeria', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes' },
                        { id: 12, email: 'sofiane.belkacemi678@example.com', firstName: 'Sofiane', lastName: 'Belkacemi', country: 'Algeria', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes' },
                        { id: 13, email: 'farid.mezouar109@example.com', firstName: 'Farid', lastName: 'Mezouar', country: 'Algeria', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes' },
                        { id: 14, email: 'said.hadj862@example.com', firstName: 'Said', lastName: 'Hadj', country: 'Algeria', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes' },
                        { id: 15, email: 'said.mezouar656@example.com', firstName: 'Said', lastName: 'Mezouar', country: 'Algeria', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes' },
                        { id: 16, email: 'mustapha.mezouar837@example.com', firstName: 'Mustapha', lastName: 'Mezouar', country: 'Algeria', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes' },
                        { id: 18, email: 'nicolas.bernard323@example.com', firstName: 'Nicolas', lastName: 'Bernard', country: 'France', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes' },
                        { id: 19, email: 'julien.martin362@example.com', firstName: 'Julien', lastName: 'Martin', country: 'France', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes' },
                        { id: 21, email: 'julien.martin536@example.com', firstName: 'Julien', lastName: 'Martin', country: 'France', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes' },
                        { id: 22, email: 'thomas.robert857@example.com', firstName: 'Thomas', lastName: 'Robert', country: 'France', roles: 'ROLE_USER', verified: 'Yes' }
                    ];

                    // Add templates to additional users
                    const templates = ['modern', 'classic', 'elegant', 'professional', 'creative', 'minimalist', 'academic', 'technical', 'ESPRIT Original'];

                    for (let i = 0; i < additionalUsers.length; i++) {
                        // Add 1-3 random templates
                        const userTemplates = [];
                        const templateCount = Math.floor(Math.random() * 3) + 1;
                        for (let j = 0; j < templateCount; j++) {
                            let template = templates[Math.floor(Math.random() * templates.length)];
                            if (!userTemplates.includes(template)) {
                                userTemplates.push(template);
                            }
                        }
                        additionalUsers[i].templates = userTemplates;

                        // Add last active date (within last 30 days)
                        const lastActive = new Date();
                        lastActive.setDate(lastActive.getDate() - Math.floor(Math.random() * 30));
                        additionalUsers[i].lastActive = lastActive.toISOString().split('T')[0];

                        // Add avatar based on gender-appropriate names
                        const genderBased = ['Farid', 'Sofiane', 'Said', 'Mustapha', 'Nicolas', 'Julien', 'Thomas'].includes(additionalUsers[i].firstName) ? 'men' : 'women';
                        additionalUsers[i].avatar = `https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/${genderBased}/${Math.floor(Math.random() * 100)}.jpg`;

                        users.push(additionalUsers[i]);
                    }

                    // If we still need more users, generate them completely
                    for (let i = users.length; i < count; i++) {
                        // Use realistic names based on country
                        let firstName, lastName, country, avatar;
                        const countryIdx = Math.floor(Math.random() * 5);

                        switch (countryIdx) {
                            case 0: // Tunisia
                                firstName = ['Mohammed', 'Ahmed', 'Mehdi', 'Walid', 'Yassine', 'Sami', 'Hichem', 'Karim'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 8)];
                                lastName = ['Ben Ali', 'Mejri', 'Bouraoui', 'Belhaj', 'Trabelsi', 'Cherif', 'Abidi'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 7)];
                                country = 'Tunisia';
                                break;
                            case 1: // France
                                firstName = ['Jean', 'Nicolas', 'Julien', 'Thomas', 'Michel', 'Pierre'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 6)];
                                lastName = ['Dubois', 'Bernard', 'Martin', 'Robert', 'Thomas'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 5)];
                                country = 'France';
                                break;
                            case 2: // Germany
                                firstName = ['Michael', 'Andreas', 'Thomas', 'Stefan', 'Wolfgang'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 5)];
                                lastName = ['Müller', 'Schmidt', 'Fischer', 'Weber', 'Schulz'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 5)];
                                country = 'Germany';
                                break;
                            case 3: // Spain
                                firstName = ['David', 'Francisco', 'Antonio', 'Manuel', 'José', 'Juan'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 6)];
                                lastName = ['López', 'Rodríguez', 'González', 'García', 'Fernández'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 5)];
                                country = 'Spain';
                                break;
                            case 4: // Algeria
                                firstName = ['Farid', 'Sofiane', 'Said', 'Mustapha', 'Karim'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 5)];
                                lastName = ['Belkacemi', 'Mezouar', 'Hadj', 'Benali'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 4)];
                                country = 'Algeria';
                                break;
                        }

                        // Random 1-3 templates
                        const userTemplates = [];
                        const templateCount = Math.floor(Math.random() * 3) + 1;
                        for (let j = 0; j < templateCount; j++) {
                            let template = templates[Math.floor(Math.random() * templates.length)];
                            if (!userTemplates.includes(template)) {
                                userTemplates.push(template);
                            }
                        }

                        // Random date in last 30 days
                        const lastActive = new Date();
                        lastActive.setDate(lastActive.getDate() - Math.floor(Math.random() * 30));

                        // Add avatar based on gender-appropriate names
                        const genderBased = ['Mohammed', 'Ahmed', 'Mehdi', 'Walid', 'Jean', 'Nicolas', 'Michael', 'Andreas', 'David', 'Francisco'].includes(firstName) ? 'men' : 'women';
                        avatar = `https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/${genderBased}/${Math.floor(Math.random() * 100)}.jpg`;

                        // Create email with number to ensure uniqueness
                        const emailNum = Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000);
                        const email = `${firstName.toLowerCase()}.${lastName.toLowerCase().replace(' ', '')}${emailNum}@example.com`;

                        users.push({
                            id: i + 1,
                            email: email,
                            firstName: firstName,
                            lastName: lastName,
                            country: country,
                            roles: 'ROLE_USER',
                            verified: Math.random() > 0.2 ? 'Yes' : 'No', // 80% yes, 20% no
                            templates: userTemplates,
                            lastActive: lastActive.toISOString().split('T')[0],
                            avatar: avatar
                        });
                    }
                }

                return users;
            }
            // Render user table
            function renderUsers(users) {
                const tableBody = document.getElementById('user-table-body');
                tableBody.innerHTML = '';

                if (users.length === 0) {
                    const row = document.createElement('tr');
                    row.innerHTML = `
            <td colspan="6" class="text-center">No users found matching your criteria</td>
        `;
                    tableBody.appendChild(row);
                    return;
                }

                users.forEach(user => {
                    const row = document.createElement('tr');

                    // Create template tags HTML
                    const templateTags = user.templates ? user.templates.map(template =>
                        `<span class="template-tag">${template}</span>`
                    ).join('') : '';

                    // Format name correctly
                    const fullName = `${user.firstName} ${user.lastName}`;

                    // Get verification status
                    const isVerified = user.verified === 'Yes';

                    row.innerHTML = `
            <td>
                <div class="user-info">
                    <img src="${user.avatar || 'https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/lego/1.jpg'}" alt="${fullName}" class="user-avatar">
                    <div class="user-info-text">
                        <div class="user-name">${fullName}</div>
                        <div class="user-email">${user.email}</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </td>
            <td>${user.country}</td>
            <td>${templateTags || '<span class="template-tag">No templates</span>'}</td>
            <td><span class="status-badge ${isVerified ? 'status-verified' : 'status-pending'}">${isVerified ? 'Verified' : 'Pending'}</span></td>
            <td>${user.lastActive || 'N/A'}</td>
            <td>
                <button class="btn-action" title="View User" onclick="viewUser(${user.id})"><i class="fas fa-eye"></i></button>
                <button class="btn-action" title="Edit User" onclick="editUser(${user.id})"><i class="fas fa-edit"></i></button>
                <button class="btn-action" title="Delete User" onclick="deleteUser(${user.id})"><i class="fas fa-trash-alt"></i></button>
            </td>
        `;

                    tableBody.appendChild(row);
                });
            }
            // Render pagination buttons
            function renderPagination(currentPage, totalPages, tab, search) {
                const paginationContainer = document.getElementById('pagination-container');
                paginationContainer.innerHTML = '';

                // Previous button
                const prevBtn = document.createElement('button');
                prevBtn.className = `pagination-item${currentPage === 1 ? ' disabled' : ''}`;
                prevBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-chevron-left"></i>';
                prevBtn.disabled = currentPage === 1;
                prevBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    loadUserData(currentPage - 1, tab, search);
                });
                paginationContainer.appendChild(prevBtn);

                // Page numbers
                let startPage = Math.max(1, currentPage - 2);
                let endPage = Math.min(totalPages, startPage + 4);

                if (endPage - startPage < 4 && startPage > 1) {
                    startPage = Math.max(1, endPage - 4);
                }

                for (let i = startPage; i <= endPage; i++) {
                    const pageBtn = document.createElement('button');
                    pageBtn.className = `pagination-item${i === currentPage ? ' active' : ''}`;
                    pageBtn.textContent = i;
                    pageBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                        loadUserData(i, tab, search);
                    });
                    paginationContainer.appendChild(pageBtn);
                }

                // Next button
                const nextBtn = document.createElement('button');
                nextBtn.className = `pagination-item${currentPage === totalPages ? ' disabled' : ''}`;
                nextBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i>';
                nextBtn.disabled = currentPage === totalPages;
                nextBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    loadUserData(currentPage + 1, tab, search);
                });
                paginationContainer.appendChild(nextBtn);
            }

            // Chat Bubble Functionality
            const chatToggle = document.getElementById('chat-toggle');
            const chatBubble = document.getElementById('chat-bubble');
            const chatClose = document.getElementById('chat-close');

            if (chatToggle && chatBubble && chatClose) {
                chatToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    chatBubble.classList.add('show');
                });

                chatClose.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    chatBubble.classList.remove('show');
                });
            }
        });
    </script>
{% endblock %}
==================================================

                            }

                                display: true,
                                text: 'Date'
                            }

                '#4F46E5', '#10B981', '#F59E0B', '#EF4444',
                '#8B5CF6', '#EC4899', '#06B6D4'
            ];

            {% for stat in templateStats %}
            templateLabels.push('{{ stat.template_name }}');
            templateData.push({{ stat.count }});
            {% endfor %}

            const popularityChart = new Chart(ctxPie, {
                type: 'pie',
                data: {
                    labels: templateLabels,
                    datasets: [{
                        data: templateData,
                        backgroundColor: colors
                    }]
                },
                options: {
                    responsive: true,
                    maintainAspectRatio: false,
                    plugins: {
                        legend: {
                            position: 'right'
                        }
                    }
                }
            });

            // Create country distribution chart
            const ctxCountry = document.getElementById('countryChart').getContext('2d');
            const countryLabels = [];
            const countryData = [];

            {% for stat in countryStats %}
            countryLabels.push('{{ stat.country }}');
            countryData.push({{ stat.count }});
            {% endfor %}

            const countryChart = new Chart(ctxCountry, {
                type: 'pie',
                data: {
                    labels: countryLabels,
                    datasets: [{
                        data: countryData,
                        backgroundColor: colors
                    }]
                },
                options: {
                    responsive: true,
                    maintainAspectRatio: false,
                    plugins: {
                        legend: {
                            position: 'right'
                        }
                    }
                }
            });
        });
    </script>

{% extends 'base.html.twig' %}

{% block title %}Template Tracker Test{% endblock %}

{% block body %}
    <div class="container py-5">
        <h1>Template Tracker Test</h1>

        <div class="card my-4">
            <div class="card-body">
                <h5 class="card-title">Test Template Selection</h5>

                <div class="mb-3">
                    <label for="templateName" class="form-label">Template Name</label>
                    <input type="text" class="form-control" id="templateName" value="tech_expert">
                </div>

                <button id="trackBtn" class="btn btn-primary" data-template-track="">Test Tracking</button>

                <div class="mt-3">
                    <h6>Response:</h6>
                    <pre id="response" class="bg-light p-3"></pre>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="card mt-4">
            <div class="card-body">
                <h5 class="card-title">View Template Stats</h5>
                <button id="statsBtn" class="btn btn-info">Get Template Stats</button>

                <div class="mt-3">
                    <h6>Statistics:</h6>
                    <pre id="stats" class="bg-light p-3"></pre>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        document.getElementById('trackBtn').addEventListener('click', function() {
            const templateName = document.getElementById('templateName').value;
            const responseEl = document.getElementById('response');

            this.setAttribute('data-template-track', templateName);
            responseEl.textContent = 'Sending request...';

            fetch('/api/track-template', {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
                body: JSON.stringify({ template: templateName })
            })
                .then(response => response.json())
                .then(data => {
                    responseEl.textContent = JSON.stringify(data, null, 2);
                })
                .catch(error => {
                    responseEl.textContent = 'Error: ' + error.message;
                });
        });

        document.getElementById('statsBtn').addEventListener('click', function() {
            const statsEl = document.getElementById('stats');
            statsEl.textContent = 'Fetching stats...';

            fetch('/api/template-stats')
                .then(response => response.json())
                .then(data => {
                    statsEl.textContent = JSON.stringify(data, null, 2);
                })
                .catch(error => {
                    statsEl.textContent = 'Error: ' + error.message;
                });
        });
    </script>
{% endblock %}
==================================================

Fichier: src\DashboardController.php
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\src\DashboardController.php
-----
<?php

namespace App\Controller;

use App\Repository\TemplateUsageRepository;
use Symfony\Bundle\FrameworkBundle\Controller\AbstractController;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Request;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Response;
use Symfony\Component\Routing\Annotation\Route;

class DashboardController extends AbstractController
{
    /**
     * @Route("/admin/dashboard", name="admin_dashboard")
     */
    public function index(Request $request, TemplateUsageRepository $templateUsageRepo): Response
    {
        // Get time range from request (default to 7 days)
        $days = $request->query->getInt('days', 7);

        // Get template statistics
        $templateStats = $templateUsageRepo->getTemplateStatistics($days);

        // Get daily trend data
        $trendData = $templateUsageRepo->getDailyTrend($days);

        // Format data for charts
        $labels = [];
        $datasets = [];

        // Process trend data for Chart.js
        $templateData = [];

        foreach ($trendData as $data) {
            $date = $data['date'];
            $template = $data['templateName'];
            $count = $data['count'];

            if (!in_array($date, $labels)) {
                $labels[] = $date;
            }

            if (!isset($templateData[$template])) {
                $templateData[$template] = [];
            }

            $templateData[$template][$date] = $count;
        }

        // Create dataset for each template
        $colors = ['#4F46E5', '#10B981', '#F59E0B', '#EF4444', '#8B5CF6', '#EC4899', '#06B6D4'];
        $i = 0;

        foreach ($templateData as $template => $data) {
            $dataPoints = [];

            foreach ($labels as $date) {
                $dataPoints[] = $data[$date] ?? 0;
            }

            $datasets[] = [
                'label' => $template,
                'data' => $dataPoints,
                'backgroundColor' => $colors[$i % count($colors)],
                'borderColor' => $colors[$i % count($colors)],
                'borderWidth' => 1
            ];

            $i++;
        }

        return $this->render('dashboard/index.html.twig', [
            'templateStats' => $templateStats,
            'chartData' => [
                'labels' => $labels,
                'datasets' => $datasets
            ],
            'days' => $days
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * @Route("/admin/stats/api", name="admin_stats_api")
     */
    public function statsApi(Request $request, TemplateUsageRepository $templateUsageRepo): Response
    {
        // Get time range from request (default to 7 days)
        $days = $request->query->getInt('days', 7);

        // Get template statistics
        $templateStats = $templateUsageRepo->getTemplateStatistics($days);

        // Get daily trend data
        $trendData = $templateUsageRepo->getDailyTrend($days);

        return $this->json([
            'templateStats' => $templateStats,
            'trendData' => $trendData
        ]);
    }
}
==================================================

Fichier: src\Command\GenerateAnalyticsDataCommand.php
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\src\Command\GenerateAnalyticsDataCommand.php
-----
<?php

namespace App\Command;

use App\Entity\TemplateUsage;
use App\Entity\User;
use Doctrine\ORM\EntityManagerInterface;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Attribute\AsCommand;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Command\Command;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Input\InputInterface;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Output\OutputInterface;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Style\SymfonyStyle;
use Symfony\Component\PasswordHasher\Hasher\UserPasswordHasherInterface;

#[AsCommand(
    name: 'app:generate-analytics-data',
    description: 'Generate simulation data for analytics dashboard',
)]
class GenerateAnalyticsDataCommand extends Command
{
    private EntityManagerInterface $entityManager;
    private UserPasswordHasherInterface $passwordHasher;

    public function __construct(
        EntityManagerInterface $entityManager,
        UserPasswordHasherInterface $passwordHasher
    ) {
        $this->entityManager = $entityManager;
        $this->passwordHasher = $passwordHasher;

        parent::__construct();
    }

    protected function execute(InputInterface $input, OutputInterface $output): int
    {
        $io = new SymfonyStyle($input, $output);
        $io->title('Generating Analytics Simulation Data');

        // Get existing users or start fresh
        $existingUsers = $this->entityManager->getRepository(User::class)->findAll();

        if (count($existingUsers) > 2) { // If more than the 2 test users
            $io->note('Existing users found. Adding template usage data only.');
            $users = $existingUsers;
        } else {
            $io->note('Creating 70 simulated users...');
            $users = $this->createUsers();
        }

        $io->note('Generating template usage data for the last 90 days...');
        $this->createTemplateUsageData($users);

        $io->success('Simulation data has been generated successfully!');

        return Command::SUCCESS;
    }

    private function createUsers(): array
    {
        // Define country data with names appropriate for each country
        $countryData = [
            'Tunisia' => [
                'names' => ['Mohammed', 'Ahmed', 'Youssef', 'Ali', 'Omar', 'Amine', 'Mehdi', 'Aymen', 'Bilel', 'Hamza'],
                'surnames' => ['Ben Ali', 'Ben Salah', 'Trabelsi', 'Bouzid', 'Nasri', 'Amri', 'Abidi', 'Cherif', 'Mansouri', 'Hamdi'],
                'domains' => ['gmail.com', 'yahoo.fr', 'outlook.com', 'hotmail.fr'],
                'count' => 15
            ],
            'Algeria' => [
                'names' => ['Karim', 'Rachid', 'Sofiane', 'Said', 'Mustapha', 'Farid', 'Khaled', 'Reda', 'Mounir', 'Nadir'],
                'surnames' => ['Bouazizi', 'Benali', 'Hadj', 'Mezouar', 'Belkacemi', 'Zidane', 'Bensalem', 'Khelifi', 'Bouziane', 'Djebar'],
                'domains' => ['gmail.com', 'yahoo.fr', 'outlook.com', 'hotmail.fr'],
                'count' => 15
            ],
            'France' => [
                'names' => ['Jean', 'Pierre', 'Thomas', 'Nicolas', 'Michel', 'Julien', 'David', 'Antoine', 'François', 'Mathieu'],
                'surnames' => ['Martin', 'Bernard', 'Dubois', 'Thomas', 'Robert', 'Richard', 'Petit', 'Durand', 'Leroy', 'Moreau'],
                'domains' => ['gmail.com', 'yahoo.fr', 'outlook.fr', 'orange.fr', 'free.fr'],
                'count' => 15
            ],
            'Germany' => [
                'names' => ['Hans', 'Michael', 'Thomas', 'Andreas', 'Stefan', 'Klaus', 'Wolfgang', 'Peter', 'Christian', 'Jürgen'],
                'surnames' => ['Müller', 'Schmidt', 'Schneider', 'Fischer', 'Weber', 'Meyer', 'Wagner', 'Becker', 'Schulz', 'Hoffmann'],
                'domains' => ['gmail.com', 'yahoo.de', 'outlook.de', 'gmx.de', 't-online.de'],
                'count' => 15
            ],
            'Spain' => [
                'names' => ['Antonio', 'José', 'Manuel', 'Francisco', 'David', 'Juan', 'Miguel', 'Javier', 'Carlos', 'Luis'],
                'surnames' => ['García', 'Rodríguez', 'González', 'Fernández', 'López', 'Martínez', 'Sánchez', 'Pérez', 'Gómez', 'Martín'],
                'domains' => ['gmail.com', 'yahoo.es', 'outlook.es', 'hotmail.es'],
                'count' => 10
            ]
        ];

        $users = [];
        $userRepo = $this->entityManager->getRepository(User::class);

        // Add Arabic names in Arabic script for some users in Tunisia and Algeria
        $arabicNames = [
            'محمد', 'أحمد', 'يوسف', 'علي', 'عمر', 'أمين', 'مهدي', 'رشيد', 'بلال', 'حمزة',
            'كريم', 'سفيان', 'سعيد', 'مصطفى', 'خالد'
        ];
        $arabicSurnames = [
            'بن علي', 'بن صالح', 'الطرابلسي', 'بوزيد', 'نصري', 'العامري', 'العبيدي',
            'الشريف', 'المنصوري', 'الحامدي', 'بوعزيزي', 'بلقاسمي', 'الجزائري', 'مزوار'
        ];

        foreach ($countryData as $country => $data) {
            for ($i = 0; $i < $data['count']; $i++) {
                $user = new User();

                // Decide if we should use an Arabic name for Tunisia/Algeria (30% chance)
                $useArabic = ($country === 'Tunisia' || $country === 'Algeria') && rand(1, 100) <= 30;

                if ($useArabic) {
                    $firstName = $arabicNames[array_rand($arabicNames)];
                    $lastName = $arabicSurnames[array_rand($arabicSurnames)];
                } else {
                    $firstName = $data['names'][array_rand($data['names'])];
                    $lastName = $data['surnames'][array_rand($data['surnames'])];
                }

                $email = strtolower($firstName . '.' . $lastName . rand(1, 999) . '@' . $data['domains'][array_rand($data['domains'])]);
                $email = str_replace(' ', '', $email);

                // Check if email already exists
                if ($userRepo->findOneBy(['email' => $email])) {
                    $email = strtolower($firstName . '.' . $lastName . rand(1000, 9999) . '@' . $data['domains'][array_rand($data['domains'])]);
                    $email = str_replace(' ', '', $email);
                }

                $user->setEmail($email);
                $user->setPassword($this->passwordHasher->hashPassword($user, 'password123'));
                $user->setIsVerified(true);

                // Add country as a custom field (assuming you have a method for this)
                // If you don't have this method, you can modify your User entity or use another approach
                if (method_exists($user, 'setCountry')) {
                    $user->setCountry($country);
                }

                // Persist user
                $this->entityManager->persist($user);
                $users[] = $user;
            }
        }

        // Flush all users at once for better performance
        $this->entityManager->flush();

        return $users;
    }

    private function createTemplateUsageData(array $users): void
    {
        // Available template names (adjust based on your actual templates)
        $templateNames = [
            'classic',
            'modern',
            'professional',
            'creative',
            'elegant',
            'minimalist',
            'academic',
            'technical'
        ];

        // Clear existing template usage data (optional)
        $this->entityManager->createQuery('DELETE FROM App\Entity\TemplateUsage t')->execute();

        // Generate data for the last 90 days
        $startDate = new \DateTime('-90 days');
        $endDate = new \DateTime();

        // Create an array of dates for the last 90 days
        $dateRange = [];
        $currentDate = clone $startDate;
        while ($currentDate <= $endDate) {
            $dateRange[] = clone $currentDate;
            $currentDate->modify('+1 day');
        }

        $totalEntries = 0;
        // For each user, generate some template usage entries
        foreach ($users as $user) {
            // Each user selects between 1-5 templates over the period
            $numSelections = rand(1, 5);

            for ($i = 0; $i < $numSelections; $i++) {
                // Random date from the range
                $selectedDate = $dateRange[array_rand($dateRange)];

                // Random time during the day
                $hour = rand(8, 22);
                $minute = rand(0, 59);
                $second = rand(0, 59);

                $selectedDateTime = clone $selectedDate;
                $selectedDateTime->setTime($hour, $minute, $second);

                // Random template
                $templateName = $templateNames[array_rand($templateNames)];

                $templateUsage = new TemplateUsage();
                $templateUsage->setUser($user);
                $templateUsage->setTemplateName($templateName);
                $templateUsage->setSelectedAt($selectedDateTime);

                $this->entityManager->persist($templateUsage);

                $totalEntries++;

                // Batch processing to avoid memory issues
                if ($totalEntries % 100 === 0) {
                    $this->entityManager->flush();
                    $this->entityManager->clear(TemplateUsage::class);
                }
            }
        }

        // Final flush
        $this->entityManager->flush();
    }
}

Fichier: src\Command\ListUsersCommand.php
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\src\Command\ListUsersCommand.php
-----
<?php

namespace App\Command;

use App\Entity\User;
use Doctrine\ORM\EntityManagerInterface;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Attribute\AsCommand;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Command\Command;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Helper\Table;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Input\InputInterface;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Input\InputOption;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Output\OutputInterface;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Style\SymfonyStyle;

#[AsCommand(
    name: 'app:list-users',
    description: 'Lists all users in the database',
)]
class ListUsersCommand extends Command
{
    private EntityManagerInterface $entityManager;

    public function __construct(EntityManagerInterface $entityManager)
    {
        $this->entityManager = $entityManager;

        parent::__construct();
    }

    protected function configure(): void
    {
        $this
            ->addOption('limit', 'l', InputOption::VALUE_OPTIONAL, 'Limit the number of users to display', 100)
            ->addOption('country', 'c', InputOption::VALUE_OPTIONAL, 'Filter by country', null);
    }

    protected function execute(InputInterface $input, OutputInterface $output): int
    {
        $io = new SymfonyStyle($input, $output);
        $limit = $input->getOption('limit');
        $country = $input->getOption('country');

        $io->title('List of Users in Database');

        $userRepository = $this->entityManager->getRepository(User::class);
        $queryBuilder = $userRepository->createQueryBuilder('u');

        if ($country) {
            $queryBuilder->where('u.country = :country')
                ->setParameter('country', $country);
        }

        $queryBuilder->setMaxResults($limit);
        $users = $queryBuilder->getQuery()->getResult();

        if (count($users) === 0) {
            $io->warning('No users found.');
            return Command::SUCCESS;
        }

        // Create a table to display user information
        $table = new Table($output);
        $table->setHeaderTitle('User List');
        $table->setHeaders(['ID', 'Email', 'First Name', 'Last Name', 'Country', 'Roles', 'Verified', 'Password']);

        $passwordNote = 'All generated users have password: "password123"';

        foreach ($users as $user) {
            $table->addRow([
                $user->getId(),
                $user->getEmail(),
                $user->getFirstName() ?? 'N/A',
                $user->getLastName() ?? 'N/A',
                $user->getCountry() ?? 'N/A',
                implode(', ', $user->getRoles()),
                $user->isVerified() ? 'Yes' : 'No',
                substr($user->getPassword(), 0, 10) . '...' // Show just the beginning of hashed password
            ]);
        }

        $table->render();
        $io->info($passwordNote);

        $io->success(sprintf('Found %d users.', count($users)));

        return Command::SUCCESS;
    }
}

Fichier: src\Command\UpdateUserPasswordCommand.php
Chemin complet: C:\Users\Sh-Pc\PhpstormProjects\EsprimCareer\src\Command\UpdateUserPasswordCommand.php
-----
<?php

namespace App\Command;

use App\Entity\User;
use Doctrine\ORM\EntityManagerInterface;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Attribute\AsCommand;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Command\Command;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Input\InputInterface;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Output\OutputInterface;
use Symfony\Component\Console\Style\SymfonyStyle;
use Symfony\Component\PasswordHasher\Hasher\UserPasswordHasherInterface;

#[AsCommand(
    name: 'app:update-user-password',
    description: 'Updates user passwords',
)]
class UpdateUserPasswordCommand extends Command
{
    private $entityManager;
    private $passwordHasher;

    public function __construct(EntityManagerInterface $entityManager, UserPasswordHasherInterface $passwordHasher)
    {
        parent::__construct();
        $this->entityManager = $entityManager;
        $this->passwordHasher = $passwordHasher;
    }

    protected function execute(InputInterface $input, OutputInterface $output): int
    {
        $io = new SymfonyStyle($input, $output);

        $userRepository = $this->entityManager->getRepository(User::class);
        $testAdminUser = $userRepository->findOneBy(['email' => 'test-admin@example.com']);
        $testUser = $userRepository->findOneBy(['email' => 'test-user@example.com']);

        if ($testAdminUser) {
            $io->success('Found test admin user');
            $hashedPassword = $this->passwordHasher->hashPassword($testAdminUser, 'password123');
            $testAdminUser->setPassword($hashedPassword);
            $io->note('Set password hash for admin: ' . $hashedPassword);
        }

        if ($testUser) {
            $io->success('Found test user');
            $hashedPassword = $this->passwordHasher->hashPassword($testUser, 'password123');
            $testUser->setPassword($hashedPassword);
            $io->note('Set password hash for user: ' . $hashedPassword);
        }

        if ($testAdminUser || $testUser) {
            $this->entityManager->flush();
            $io->success('Changes flushed to database');
        } else {
            $io->error('No test users found');
            return Command::FAILURE;
        }

        return Command::SUCCESS;
    }
}

<?php
// Last updated: 2025-05-08 12:05:00
// Author: Mohamed-abidi-95

namespace App\Controller;

use App\Entity\TemplateUsage;
use App\Service\LatexPdfGenerator;
use Symfony\Bundle\FrameworkBundle\Controller\AbstractController;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\HeaderUtils;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Request;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Response;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\BinaryFileResponse;
use Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\ResponseHeaderBag;
use Symfony\Component\Routing\Attribute\Route;
use Dompdf\Dompdf;
use Dompdf\Options;
use Doctrine\ORM\EntityManagerInterface;
use Psr\Log\LoggerInterface;
use Symfony\Component\Process\Process;
use Symfony\Component\Routing\Generator\UrlGeneratorInterface;


class CVGeneratorController extends AbstractController
{
    private LoggerInterface $logger;
    private ?LatexPdfGenerator $latexPdfGenerator;
    private EntityManagerInterface $entityManager;

    public function __construct(LoggerInterface $logger, EntityManagerInterface $entityManager, ?LatexPdfGenerator $latexPdfGenerator = null)
    {

        $this->latexPdfGenerator = $latexPdfGenerator;
        $this->entityManager = $entityManager;
    }

    #[Route("/latex", name: "app_latex")]
    public function latex(): Response

        ]);
